column5: It,s been a week or so that I was invited out to share some waters of aniceguy and today was the day and what a day. I started out catch,n right off the bat, while my local water friend was finding the bite a bit tough,but as the day went on,he put the hurt on.Remember,he,s over six feet and a big guy so fish look small.LOL  Baits for the day consist of wizzles and spinner baits along with some top water.  We probly caught over 40 or so mixed bag of buckets and small mouth. The action was awesome.                The bigg,n of the morning,4 and change on a wizzle tomatoe core.    One fish that was caught had what looked like red bleeding boils. NASTY    Thanks for the day out you nice guy you.LOL
Great report guys!  Nice to see these kinds of reports where members of the board can get together and have a great time.  Some real lunkers there!!!
dang, looks like a great day of fishing   but could you fold up your boat at the end of the day and throw it in the back of your truck....LOL
LOL a couple of nice guys in a boat, with some nice fish. Wizzle? senko?
Wow, I'm speechless. I had no idea that Louis could actually catch fish!  :lol:
they are some nice fish looks like you guys had a great day way to go
Still got that funky footwear I see!  Nice fish BTW
Very nice B, now if only you could catch bass when your in a tournament  That beats my day at work all to hell!  Joey

nice report...came into the city for the afternoon for my son's baseball game.....Brian seems like I found a topwater bite this am....1 fish 5.45 2nd 6.11  pics to follow in a few weeks when Im back from the cottage
They were only biting for 25 minutes?
LMAO ROY I believe that was my hieght and his.LOL   Sweet.I believe what I was doing was almost a top water bite aswell. LOL  Thanks again for the day.
